p: At present, a total of 14 full-length genome sequences of 2019-nCoV have been submitted to GISAID and among them only one has been released on GenBank (Accession No: MN908947) (Ji et al., 2020). Coronaviruses are classified into four sub-families based on their genetic properties, alpha-, beta-, gamma-, and delta-coronavirus. SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV belong to the genus beta-coronavirus and can induce severe respiratory diseases in humans (Hilgenfeld and Peiris, 2013).
